## WorkerDecoderProtocol.TileInfoRequest interface

This object is sent to the decoder asking for a tile info of a specific tile. The expected response type is a \[\[DecodedTile\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface TileInfoRequest extends WorkerServiceProtocol.ServiceRequest 
```
